nodes.text: Explosive Developments was a short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer with illustrations by John Paul Lona. It was published in the Star Wars Adventure Journal 3 by West End Games in August 1994.
The story details Jai Raventhorn's attempt to kill Imperial Moff Antoll Jellrek at his estate on Romar. She is unsuccessful and is almost apprehended by the bounty hunter Beylyssa.
